entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 7:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Clear

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
